17 public:

21  virtual bool entry_action(void);
23  virtual bool action(void);
24 
26  virtual State * exit_condition(State * slist[]);
27 
28  inline void set_exit_state_left(const char * exit_state){ _exit_state_left = exit_state; }
29  inline void set_exit_state_right(const char * exit_state){ _exit_state_right = exit_state; }
30 
32  inline const char * exit_state_left() const { return _exit_state_left; }
34  inline const char * exit_state_right() const { return _exit_state_right; }
35

38

40  bool draw(void);
41

Called when entering state.

Called repeated while in the state.
